improvement_list.improvement_desc: Potential division by zero. Add a check to ensure y is not zero before dividing x by y.
Unreachable code. The loop will always execute, and the condition `x % 2` will always be evaluated, rendering this path unreachable.
The loop always executes, even if the condition is false. This block will always be executed.
The initialization of x and y is not really necessary for the program's logic, especially because they are immediately overwritten in the loop.
